tool_description:
An API that provides real-time access to product, shop, and category data from the Shopee e-commerce platform. Our data encompasses 8 Shopee sites in Southeast Asia (Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, Taiwan, Brazil).

country code list: my, th, vn, ph, sg, id, tw, br
name: shopee-api
title: shopee-api

api_list.name: Item detail API
api_list.description: An API that provides real-time access to product, shop, and category data from the Shopee e-commerce platform. Our data encompasses  8  Shopee sites in Southeast Asia (Thailand, Philippines, Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Vietnam, Taiwan, Brazil).

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: country: my, th, vn, ph, sg, id, tw, br

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shopee-api.p.rapidapi.com/shopee/v2/tw/shop/493265569/item/21725369961"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopee-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://shopee-api.p.rapidapi.com/shopee/v2/{country}/shop/{shop_id}/item/{item_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shopee-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
